title: Lexar PLAY 2280 SE SSD Designed for PlayStation 5 Launched
text:
Lexaris excited to announce the Lexar PLAY 2280 SE PCIe 4.0 4TB SSD. This drive delivers maximum read speeds of 7000MB/s and maximum write speeds of 6000MB/s to reduce load times and deliver seamless gameplay on PlayStation 5 consoles.
Features
Designed to match and enhance your PS5 gaming experience
Exceptional performance ensures reduced load times and seamless gameplay
Tested and approved storage for your PS5 console lets you play directly from the drive no need to transfer or delete games from your console
Built with a stylish heatsink optimised for PS5 to maintain peak performance and power efficiency
4TB capacity lets you store about 100+ AAA games
Built to complement the PS5, the Lexar PLAY 2280 SE PCIe 4.0 4TB SSD enhances the gaming experience with a unique heatsink that helps maintain optimal performance during intense gaming sessions. With 4TB of additional storage, the drive can hold up to 100 AAA games.
Availability and Pricing
The Lexar PLAY 2280 SE PCIe 4.0 SSD (7000/6000 MB/s) is tested and approved storage for your PS5 console in 4TB for an MSRP of $224.99, available in
Costcoin the United States. Learn more about the Lexar PLAY 2280 SE PCIe 4.0 SSD at
Lexar.com.
The faster Lexar PLAY 2280 PCIe 4.0 SSD (7400/6500 MB/s) is listed on
Amazon USand
Amazon UK.
